DOC.HEADLINE: PHONE CHATTER COMES BACK AS A WINNER
DOC.TEXT: Phone Chatter , last year ' s 2-year-old filly champion , made her first start in 10 months Thursday and rallied from last to win the $ 55 # 600 C.E.R.F. Stakes by a length over Airistar at Del Mar . Ridden by Laffit Pincay and carrying 117 pounds , Phone Chatter covered 6 1 / 2 furlongs in 1:15 . She paid $ 3 , $ 2.60 , $ 2.20. Airistar returned $ 4 and $ 3 , while Klassy Kim , another half-length back in third , was $ 3.20 to show . Phone Chatter hadn ' t competed since fracturing her hind_leg while winning the Breeders ' Cup Juvenile Fillies on Nov . 6 . She won the Eclipse Award as the nation ' s top 2-year-old filly .
